Sequence Information.Peptide Name: gamma1-hordothionin (gamma1 H, defensin, natural AMPs; UCSS1a; 4S=S, Plants)

Literature Information.Literature: Refer to Bruix M et al. (1995) Biopolymers 36: 751-63. Solution structure was determined by NMR (Bruix M et al., 1993). It has a well-defined triple-stranded antiparallel beta-sheet (residues 1-6, 31-34, and 39-47), an alpha-helix (residues 16-28), and the corresponding connecting loops. Transgenic plants: expression of this peptide in tobacco improves resistance to pathogens (Montesinos E 2007 FEMS Microbiol Lett 270, 1-11). Updated 7/2016.
Literature Information.Author: Mendez E et al de Haro C1990
Literature Information.Title: Primary structure and inhibition of protein synthesis in eukaryotic cell-free system of a novel thionin, gamma-hordothionin, from barley endosperm
